participant_1.name: Alex Carter
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and competitive, enjoys sports and family life.
participant_1.background: i'm a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house. my family is continuously growing. i am married to a doctor.

participant_2.name: Sophie Nguyen
participant_2.personality: Resilient and motivated, passionate about health and fitness.
participant_2.background: i'm a cancer survivor. my parents were both very athletic. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i am a clean eater. i love running and preparing for marathons.
